description:
An attractive and academically distinguished second-year student in the management strategy department. Miorine is the only daughter of http://anidb.net/ch126121 [Delling Rembran], the president of the http://anidb.net/ch132088 [Benerit Group] and chairman of the school`s board. She has a strong rebellious feeling towards her father.
Source: Official page
name: Miorine Rembran
